Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Night Hotel Times Square in New York (Broadway - Times Square), you'll be minutes from Broadway and Times Square. This 4-star hotel is close to Rockefeller Center and Grand Central Terminal.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 208 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and irons/ironing boards, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Night Hotel Times Square in New York (Broadway - Times Square), you'll be minutes from Broadway and Times Square. This 4-star hotel is close to Rockefeller Center and Grand Central Terminal.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Broadway - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Minskoff Theater - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Circle in the Square Theater - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Toys 'R' Us Times Square - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi

Times Square - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
New Amsterdam Theater - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Top of the Rock Observation Deck - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
NBC Studios - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Madame Tussauds Wax Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Rockefeller Center - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Roseland Ballroom - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The nearest airports are:
New York, NY (JRB-Downtown Manhattan Heliport) - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 9.6 km / 6 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 18 km / 11.2 mi
New York, NY (JFK-John F. Kennedy Intl.) - 21.2 km / 13.2 mi

The preferred airport for Night Hotel Times Square is New York, NY (JFK-John F. Kennedy Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Stay. are:

New York, NY (JFK-John F. Kennedy Intl.) - 21.2 km / 13.2 mi

The preferred airport for Stay. is New York, NY (JFK-John F. Kennedy Intl.).

RoomType.text: Double Deluxe Room with City View

Message.Text:
INFO!! DO NOT BOOK MORE THAN ONE ROOM UNDER THE SAME NAME IN ORDER TO AVOID ANY DUPLICY ISSUES FOR THE HOTEL // NO RESERVAS MAS DE UNA HABITACION CON EL MISMO NOMBRE PARA EVITAR CONFUSIONES CON RESERVAS DUPLICADAS

WE DO HAVE BABY COTS BASED ON AVAILABILITY // TENEMOS CUNAS EN FUNCION DE LA DISPONIBILIDAD

OCCUPANCY TAX 3,50$ PER ROOM PER NIGTH PAYMENT ON ARRIVAL // TASA DE OCUPACION3,50$ POR HABITACION POR NOCHE PAGO EN HOTEL ------------------------ FACILITY FEE 15$+8.875% PER ROOM, PER NIGHT PAYMENT ON ARRIVAL // FACILITY FEE15$+8.875% POR HABITACION Y NOCHE, PAGO DIRECTO EN EL HOTEL, obligatoria para todas las reservas

Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%
